participant_1.background:
I enjoy wearing my cat-eye glasses while training to compete in the Olympics.
I am raising my kids on my own.
I enjoy spending time with my wife and friends, and I love her pasta.
I'm a food blogger who loves to share my favorite restaurant finds with my readers.
my parents have been married for 40 years.

participant_2.background:
I want to ride my horse at full speed across the open plain to feel the wind in my hair and the sun on my face.
I was recently bedridden for a week, so I had to eat a lot of soft foods that were easy to digest.
i spend too much time shopping.
my car is pink.
my favorite band is radiolead.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a food blogger and I love to share my favorite restaurant finds with my readers. What are your favorite restaurants?

I love to go to the new restaurant that just opened up. It's got a really cool atmosphere and the food is amazing. I also love to go to the local diner. It's not fancy, but the food is delicious and the people are so friendly.
I love going to new restaurants too! It's so much fun to try new things. I'm not so big on the diner scene, but I know a lot of people who love it.
I know what you mean. It's not for everyone, but I love the homey atmosphere and the good old-fashioned comfort food.
No, I don't have any pets. I've always wanted a dog, but I just haven't had the time to take care of one.
I have two dogs. They're the best pets ever! They're always so happy to see me and they make me laugh every day.
I'm sure they do! Dogs are the best.
What are some of your hobbies?
I love to go shopping. I'm always looking for new clothes and accessories. I also love to read. I'm always reading a book.
I love to read too! I'm always looking for new books to read. I love to read all kinds of different genres.
I love to read a variety of genres too, but my favorite is romance.
Romance is my favorite genre too! I love a good love story
